description:
Well is forced to make an unexpected return home when Duke Bleichroder asks him to purify the undead lurking within the Enchanted Forest. Yet what awaits him at home is his openly hostile eldest brother Kurt. Well intends to leave as soon as he completes his quest, but he`s forced to remain there without ample explanation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un râleur invétéré ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
クレーマーって, それはないでしょう!
